section.title: The Edit Tax Authority Categories screen.
section.para: The Tax Authority Categories sub menu screen allows you link a tax authority to a specific catalog or product category.
It can be used to add product categories to a tax authority. This means that all products in this category will be taxed at the rate specified for the tax authority.

An example of this could be separating products into categories for export to different countries. A separate tax authority will be associated with each category so that the specific tax rate for each of them will be applied.

section.title: How do I add a new Tax Authority / Category mapping?

listitem.para: Enter or Lookup the 'Category Id' to be mapped
The new mapping will be displayed at the bottom of the screen

section.title: How do I update a Tax Authority / Category mapping?
section.para: A Tax Authority / Category mapping cannot be updated. If it needs to be changed then the entry must be deleted and then re-entered.

section.title: How do I remove a Tax Authority / Category mapping?

listitem.para: Locate the entry that needs to be removed
Press the 'Delete' button next to the entry
